name.baseName: 蒸汽/热水/其它|烟煤|水煤浆炉|所有规模

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution sulfur dioxideisSpray drying process，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management70

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution sulfur dioxideisSpray drying process，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management70
technology.technologicalApplicability: 该数据集代表了所有规模的燃用烟煤水煤浆的锅炉所采用的各种尾气污染管理技术。数据集涵盖了湿式沉降、石灰石/石膏湿法过程、氧化镁法、钠碱法、氨法、双碱法、烟气循环流化床法、喷雾干燥过程、机械除尘、袋式过滤技术、干式静电沉降、电袋复合除尘器、湿式静电沉降、SNCR、SCR和SNCR-SCR组合技术，并分别提供了管理二氧化硫、烟尘和氮氧化物排放的技术效率。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 第二次全国污染源普查产排污核算系数手册（试用版）,四级代码4430文件，在完整版文件中第5426页

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: This dataset is derived from the Pollution Source Census Report and contains information on pollution emissions and related products. However, it does not include data on energy or chemical consumption, nor does it provide information on waste or co-product generation. When utilizing this dataset, please supplement the missing data based on actual conditions before use
该数据集来源于污染源普查报告，包含污染物排放及相关产品信息，但不包含能源或化学品消耗数据，也不提供废弃物或共生产物产生信息。在使用该数据集时，请根据实际情况补充缺失数据后再使用。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

common:referenceToPersonOrEntityGenerati.common:shortDescription: The data was created by the Office of the Second National Pollution Source Census of the Ministry of Ecology and Environment, and the data was organized by the TianGong Plan team for ILCD format
生态环境部第二次全国污染源普查工作办公室创建数据，天工计划团队常慧敏整理数据为ILCD格式

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: nan
源文件中描述为为烟煤，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为工业废气量
the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Exhaust gasis/
污染物指标工业废气量的末端治理技术是/。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为工业废气量，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为工业废气量
the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Exhaust gasisWith terminal treatment technology
污染物指标工业废气量的末端治理技术是有末端治理。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为工业废气量，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为工业废气量

Pollutant indicator sulfur dioxide end-of-pipe treatment technology is /, its efficiency is 0. The original document describes the pollutant category as exhaust gas, the pollutant indicator is sulfur dioxide, here to match it to the most compatible flow in the LCAflow library, the pollutant indicator note for sulfur dioxide in the original description of the coefficient of production of pollution is 17 S. Please modify the corresponding emissions after self-calculation according to the note.
污染物指标二氧化硫的末端治理技术是/，其效率为0。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为二氧化硫，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为二氧化硫原文描述的产污系数为 17S。请根据备注自行核算后修改对应的排放量。

Pollutant indicators of nitrogen oxides of end-of-pipe treatment technology is SNCR, its efficiency is 30, end-of-pipe treatment facilities, the actual operating rate (k value) calculated as K = denitrification facilities annual operating hours / boiler annual operating hours. The original document describes the pollutant category as exhaust gas, the pollutant indicator is nitrogen oxides, here to match it to the LCAflow library face to face the most compatible flow, the pollutant indicator note for nitrogen oxides described in the original production coefficient of 2.72 (no low-nitrogen combustion). Please modify the corresponding emissions according to the note after the self-calculation.
污染物指标氮氧化物的末端治理技术是SNCR，其效率为30，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为K=脱硝设施年运行小时数/锅炉年运行小时数。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为氮氧化物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为氮氧化物原文描述的产污系数为 2.72（无低氮燃烧）。请根据备注自行核算后修改对应的排放量。

Pollutant indicators of nitrogen oxides of end-of-pipe treatment technology is SNCR, its efficiency is 30, end-of-pipe treatment facilities, the actual operating rate (k value) calculated as K = denitrification facilities annual operating hours / boiler annual operating hours. The original document describes the pollutant category as exhaust gas, the pollutant indicator is nitrogen oxides, here to match it to the LCAflow library face to face the most compatible flow, the pollutant indicator note for nitrogen oxides described in the original production coefficient of 2.18 (low-nitrogen combustion). Please modify the corresponding emissions according to the note.
污染物指标氮氧化物的末端治理技术是SNCR，其效率为30，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为K=脱硝设施年运行小时数/锅炉年运行小时数。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为氮氧化物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为氮氧化物原文描述的产污系数为 2.18（低氮燃烧）。请根据备注自行核算后修改对应的排放量。

Pollutant indicators of sulfur dioxide end-of-pipe treatment technology is wet de-dusting method, its efficiency is 15, end-of-pipe treatment facilities actual operating rate (k value) formula for K = desulfurization facilities annual operating hours / boiler annual operating hours. The original document describes the pollutant category as exhaust gas, the pollutant indicator for sulfur dioxide, here to match it to the LCAflow library face to face the most compatible flow, the pollutant indicator note for sulfur dioxide described in the original production coefficient of 17 S. Please modify the corresponding emissions according to the note after their own accounting.
污染物指标二氧化硫的末端治理技术是湿法除尘法，其效率为15，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为K=脱硫设施年运行小时数/锅炉年运行小时数。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为二氧化硫，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为二氧化硫原文描述的产污系数为 17S。请根据备注自行核算后修改对应的排放量。

The end-of-pipe treatment technology for the pollutant indicator NOx is / and its efficiency is 0. The original document describes the pollutant category as exhaust gas and the pollutant indicator as NOx, and the matching work has been carried out here to match it to the most compatible flow in the LCAflow library, and the production coefficient of the pollutant indicator commented as NOx is 2.18 (low-NOx combustion) in the original description. 污染物指标二氧化硫的末端治理技术是烟气循环流化床法，其效率为85，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为K=脱硫设施年运行小时数/锅炉年运行小时数。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为二氧化硫，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为二氧化硫原文描述的产污系数为 17S。请根据备注自行核算后修改对应的排放量。
